dma_analytics.name: Analytics
dma_analytics.description: See the big picture with customer intelligence from Adobe Analytics, the industry-leading solution for applying real-time analytics and detailed segmentation across every marketing channel.

dma_audiencemanager.name: Audience Manager
dma_audiencemanager.description: As a data management platform, Adobe Audience Manager helps you build unique audience profiles, so you can discover and target your most valuable customer segments on every channel.

dma_social.name: Social
dma_social.description: As a social management platform, Adobe Social makes it easy to measure and improve customer relationships through social marketing and integrating it into the overall marketing plan.

dma_campaign.name: Campaign
dma_campaign.description: Adobe Campaign lets you plan, deliver, and measure campaigns across all of your online and offline channels. It helps increase your productivity and deliver relevant experiences to your customers.

dma_adlens.name: Media Optimizer
dma_adlens.description: Adobe Media Optimizer is a programmatic ad-buying solution. It helps you find and forecast the best mix of ad channels based on your budget, then automates the delivery of content right to your audience.

dma_aem_ams.name: Experience Manager
dma_aem_ams.description: As a content management solution, Adobe Experience Manager makes it easy to manage your assets and content for your websites, mobile apps, communities, and forms.

dma_scene7.name: Experience Manager
dma_scene7.description: As a content management solution, Adobe Experience Manager makes it easy to manage your assets and content for your websites, mobile apps, communities, and forms.

dma_tnt.name: Target
dma_tnt.description: Adobe Target helps you identify what your customers want, so you can deliver personalized and engaging experiences in real time.

dma_bullseye.name: Target
dma_bullseye.description: Adobe Target helps you identify what your customers want, so you can deliver personalized and engaging experiences in real time.

dma_primetime.name: Primetime
dma_primetime.description: Adobe Primetime is a multiscreen TV platform that helps broadcasters create engaging TV and film experiences that are personalized for any audience.

services.name: Activation
services.description: Activate web-based technologies, trigger real-time actions, and turn on in-app analytics and optimization with the Activation core service.

services.name: Assets
services.description: Easily store, sync, and share all of your digital assets in a central location, to save time and deliver a more consistent customer experience.

services.name: Data Platform
services.description: The Data Platform allows you to combine data from different sources to drive powerful data-science functionality within the Marketing Cloud.

services.name: Mobile Services
services.description: Whether you're building a mobile site or launching a mobile app, understand how your customers are interacting with your brand, wherever they are.

services.name: Profiles & Audiences
services.description: Continually build a comprehensive view of your individual customers using both authenticated and anonymous data.
